Dial and call phone numbers with a single click from any webpage. 
 
With this extension, CloudCall’s Click to Call and Click to SMS features are available to help you make more connections, faster. Automatically identify phone numbers on a webpage and choose to call or SMS.  

Boost your team’s productivity on the go with CloudCall, the business phone system that integrates seamlessly with your CRM 

Connect faster with prospects by bringing caller information right into your CRM workflow. Log calls, schedule follow-ups, and accelerate deals without ever switching screens. Powerful features tailored for recruiters and sales teams help you reduce the time to fill and close more deals. 

Empower your team to collaborate and connect on the go with our mobile app. Crystal clear audio, messaging, and advanced tools keep everyone aligned, whether they're in the office or remote. 

Choose from customizable plans that scale as you grow. With reliable uptime and robust security, you can rest easy knowing your communications are protected.
 
Bring your team together and transform candidate and customer interactions with CloudCall. 

Download CloudCall today. Subscription required - features may vary by plan
